item.description:
Over 500 people attended last week. Arrive early to avoid the lines.

Join me for a fantastic way to help the Boston Marathon Bombing victims.

Starting this Tuesday, and continuing for the next two Tuesdays the Beer Hall at Harpoon Brewery will be open an extra hour each Tuesday from 6-9, to help raise funds for the  Boston  One Fund.  All workers are volunteering their time and all proceeds from the sale of pretzels and beer will go to Boston One Fund.  I'll be stopping by about 6-I'll see you there if you can join us.  But if not tomorrow, then think about  May 7th, stop by the Harpoon Beer Hall, have a great beer (or two) and some pretzels and help the victims of the Boston Marathon Bombings.  No need to RSVP, just show up and help.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the Beer Hall at 6 on April 23rd
item.name: Boston One Fund Benefit at Harpoon Brewery
